description:
Explore more. These running-inspired hiking boots are built to cover distance rapidly. The VECTIV 2.0 midsole stabilizes your foot over rough terrain, while providing energy-return and forward propulsion. The ultra-breathable FUTURELIGHT™ membrane keeps water out and lets hot air escape, so your feet are cool and comfortable when you reach camp.

  • Premium nubuck leather upper wears well and looks great
  • FutureLight™ waterproof-breathable membrane keeps your feet dry and comfortable
  • Mid-height collar supports and stabilizes your ankle
  • Supportive VECTIV 2.0 midsole with rocker geometry provides a smooth step
  • 3D TPU plate adds stability
  • Surface Control™ rubber with 4mm lugs grip solid or loose terrain
name: The North Face Vectiv Exploris 2 Mid Futurelight Light Trail Running shoes - Women's
